Operating a Shaper by Rudy Kouhoupt (DVD)
Learn from a Master.

Price: 	  	$62.95

You may remember Rudy's articles in 
The Home Shop Machinist called "Old Iron."

This video shows you the various functions on his reconditioned shaper and how you can operate one yourself.

(2 hours).

Rudy has always been a proponent of the "Keep it Simple" method of machine and tool design and machining style. You will learn much from his approaches.
